entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
